summary: Implemented Gemini-based summary script generation for meeting recaps. Added `src/lib/script-generator.ts`, `src/lib/prompts.ts`, `src/types/script.ts`, and `src/app/api/generate-script/route.ts` with POST handling that returns a script chunk array for a `meetingId`, including Granola auth/session handling and JSON parsing/validation. Added TDD coverage in `tests/summary-script-generator.test.mjs` (initially failing, now passing). Verification: `npm test` (12/12 passing), `npm run build` (Next.js build successful), and `npx tsc --noEmit` (no errors). Also appended task learnings/decisions/issues to feature notepads.
